BIT150 Applied Bioinformatics

Welcome BIT150 class of 2017!

26 Sep 2017

Welcome to BIT150.

The first lecture will be on Thursday 9/28 at 10:00 in Hoagland 113.

Prior to class, please read the Schatz 2015 paper, and complete the BIT 150 Pre-Class Assessment - both available on the CANVAS site. The paper discusses the future of biological research over the next 20 years. Hopefully it will provide motivation for the content weâ€™ll cover this quarter. The quiz is a refresher on biological concepts that we will build on throughout the course.

We look forward to meeting you on Thursday!

Dan and Shawn
